Get posts from a specific user

get_user_posts.Rd

Get posts from a specific user

Usage

get_user_posts(
  actor,
  token,
  max_retries = 3,
  retry_delay = 5,
  filter = "posts_no_replies",
  limit = 100,
  return_df = TRUE
)

Arguments

actor

character, the handle or DID of the user

token

character, authentication token

max_retries

integer, maximum number of retries

retry_delay

real, delay in seconds between retries

filter

character, posts to filter for. Possible values "posts_with_replies", "posts_no_replies", "posts_with_media", "posts_and_author_threads", "posts_with_video."

limit

integer, max number of posts

return_df

boolean, return responses as tibble

Value

tibble or json string with posts information

See also
